synopsis: In this enlightening episode of Pineapple Blend Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir delve into the complexities of work-life balance, sharing personal experiences and insights on navigating the pressures of modern life. They emphasize the importance of self-awareness and mindfulness, encouraging listeners to prioritize their well-being while pursuing their passions.
quotes: At the end of every single day, you deserve to feel whole and full and not worry about all the things you have to do tomorrow.
Work-life balance is about you; it's your life.
It's so easy to get caught up in the mindset of 'I need to be productive' and forget to actually live.
You canâ€™t create anything if you're constantly consuming.
What would love have me do today?
Life happens between the work hard and play hard.
The most creative mind is a bored mind.
It's not about the number of hours you work; it's about the quality of your time spent.
We need to redefine our relationship with social media to find fulfillment.
Every generation thinks the next one has it easy; it's a sign of progress.
